content: Meet the world of Heptagon Sport Metaverse!💠In the Stadiums built in the Heptagon Metaverse, sports enthusiasts have the opportunity to watch live broadcasts recorded with 360XR cameras from wherever they want, with XR glasses/helmets, as if they were in the stadium.💠Hepta is the transaction unit of the Heptagon Metaverse Ecosystem.💠Total supply is 40 Million units.💠Users will be able to participate tournaments, watching sports events🎦, play football, basketball ⚽🏀, bowling🎳, Tennis🎾🏓, Golf⛳ and mint NFT's in Heptagon Metaverse using Hepta!💠Live broadcast revenues, Advertising revenues, Sponsorship agreements revenues, NFT&AVATAR market transaction fees, Virtual championship participation fees, and Virtual store shopping transaction commissions are the basic income of the ecosystem.💠Heptagon Metaverse Beta will be ready as of February.Heptagon WhitepaperHeptagon Websitehttps://hptgn.io/⏰️Pre-Sale Start Date: January 25, 2023 Time: 20.00⏰️Pre-Sale End Date: March 1, 2023 Time: 20:00💵Presale Price: $0.32🎉 Byte Exchange offers the opportunity to buy at special discounted prices depending on the purchase amount, Bext staking, and commemorative coin ownership.HOW DO I PARTICIPATE IN PRESALE?1- Become a member of Byte Exchange now.2- Log in to bytepad.io using your Byte Exchange platform login credentials on the bytepad pre-sale platform.3- The units you can participate in the Hepta Token Launch are BEXT, USDT, BUSD crypto asset units. If you do not have these units in your wallet, you can make your transfer transactions to the Byte Exchange platform and make your purchase through USDT, BUSD, BEXT trading pairs. The relevant participating units will be automatically displayed on the Bytepad platform. Follow the transaction steps by determining the amounts you will acquire Hepta Token according to your existing crypto units.4- After the purchase process is completed, you can view your transaction details on the Bytepad platform.5- You can obtain the information about the distributions related to your Hepta Token purchase in your Bytepad transaction details on which dates and how many quantities will be allocated to you in quantity.Details:https://bytepad.io/project-details?wd_id=18#project_26Byte ExchangeBytepad
